headline: McDonald's quietly fixes its customers' biggest menu beef
summary: Americans increasingly see fast food as a luxury item. With costs rising everywhere, people have looked more closely at what they're spending, and they're not always liking what they see, especially when it comes to fast food. It's an area known for offering good value, but many American no longer ...

headline: Bank of America Trims McDonald’s (MCD) Target as Oppenheimer Turns Bullish
summary: McDonald’s Corporation (NYSE:MCD) is included among the 12 Best Dow Jones Dividend Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds. On January 26, Bank of America trimmed its price target on McDonald’s Corporation (NYSE:MCD) to $344 from $348 and kept a Neutral rating on the stock. The adjustment came as the firm fine-tuned estimates across 22 […]

headline: Taco Bell promotes Michelle Beasley to COO
summary: She joined the chain in 2024 after more than 23 years in various operations roles at Panera Bread

headline: McDonald's Corporation (MCD) Is a Trending Stock: Facts to Know Before Betting on It
summary: Recently, Zacks.com users have been paying close attention to McDonald's (MCD). This makes it worthwhile to examine what the stock has in store.

headline: Starbucks plots the next phase of its turnaround with new drinks, loyalty program tweaks
summary: Starbucks released a long-term forecast and shared more details about how it plans to hit those financial targets at an investor presentation.

headline: McDonald’s Fraud Partnership And Nostalgia Push Shape Growth Story
summary: McDonald's is launching a global partnership with fraud prevention firm Forter to strengthen digital identity and payment security across its platforms. The company is bringing back its nostalgic Changeables Happy Meal toys, aimed at reengaging long time fans and younger customers. Management has confirmed plans for significant global and U.S. restaurant expansion, new menu launches, and refreshed value offerings. For investors watching NYSE:MCD, the mix of tech investment, branding moves,...
